verbs.description: [V: switching] [ARG1: ownership of the s corp] one of the benefits of organizing your small business as a corporation is the built - in ownership transfer structure generally owners of a corporation can transfer their interest in the company to someone else by simply selling their shares of stock however making a subchapter s election for your small corporation internal revenue service s
